channel.title: Comments on: Pitch a waiter at Curry 2.0

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description:
We have a couple coming from the UK especially for this too - including Robert Loch (Internet People).
Nearly have full compliment - would like more investors and someone from Enterprise Ireland to come along.
item.content:encoded:
We have a couple coming from the UK especially for this too – including Robert Loch (Internet People).

Nearly have full compliment – would like more investors and someone from Enterprise Ireland to come along.
